name: Classic Tee
description: Elevate your wardrobe essentials with our Classic White T-Shirt. Crafted from premium cotton fabric, this timeless piece offers unbeatable comfort and style for everyday wear. The Classic White T-Shirt features a relaxed fit and a crew neckline for a versatile look that suits all occasions. Pair it with your favorite denim for a laid-back weekend vibe, or layer it under a blazer for a smart-casual ensemble.
